name: andvent-of-code
description: Don't look until solved it youself

scripts.start: cd ${npm_config_day}; cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='-r ts-node/register' node --stack-size=32000 ${npm_config_day} input
scripts.test: cd ${npm_config_day}; cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='-r ts-node/register' node --stack-size=32000 ${npm_config_day} input.test
scripts.prepareday: mkdir -p ${npm_config_day}; cp template.ts ${npm_config_day}/${npm_config_day}.ts; touch ${npm_config_day}/input;touch ${npm_config_day}/input.test; npm config set day ${npm_config_day} --userconfig ./.npmrc
